column4: hi i just installed gutsy and tried to install flash plugin for firefox. when i did the command in terminal. Can someone tell me if this is normal? http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/47686/    if so then why is firefox telling me i need to install the plugin when i go somewhere like youtube?
the flash plugin currenlt has an installation issue that is being fixed
ok thanks
I don't think it's in the PPC community repo's
well from what iv read it is sudo apt-get install mozilla-plugin-gnash CruCio
on PPC ?
I don't think it actually exists in the PPC repo
on psubuntu.com iv found that it does http://psubuntu.com/forum/viewtopic.php?p=6583&sid=a4dd3adba62f64a67c926ecf1afe3b43

one moment, this is normally a theme issue
http://ubuntuforums.org/showpost.php?p=2457090&postcount=8
follow that post and it will fix it
ok, for some reason kdm is being used instead of gdm. how would I change it back?
ahhh, now we are getting somewhere
one moment, I have a forum thread for you on that too
can't find it, but ir you go "system --> administation --> login window" you should be able to select it to that
